mapper.select: SELECT a.interest_area_id, a.dong_code, d.city_name, d.gugun_name, d.name FROM interest_area a, dong_code d WHERE a.user_seq = #{userSeq} and a.dong_code=d.code
SELECT count(*) from interest_area WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interest_area ( user_seq, dong_code ) VALUES ( #{userSeq}, #{dongCode} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM interest_area WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} and dong_code = #{dongCode}
mapper.select: SELECT h.interest_house_id, h.house_no, d.dong, d.aptName FROM interest_house h, housedeal d WHERE h.user_seq = #{userSeq} and h.house_no=d.no
SELECT count(*) from interest_house WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interest_house ( user_seq, house_no ) VALUES ( #{userSeq}, #{houseNo} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM interest_house WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} and house_no = #{houseNo}
mapper.select: SELECT d.city_name, d.name, d.gugun_name, d.code, a.cnt FROM dong_code d, (SELECT dong_code, COUNT(dong_code) AS cnt FROM interest_area GROUP BY dong_code ORDER BY cnt DESC) a WHERE d.code = a.dong_code;
SELECT a.house_no, d.aptName, d.dong, a.cnt FROM housedeal d, (SELECT house_no, COUNT(house_no) AS cnt FROM interest_house GROUP BY house_no ORDER BY cnt DESC) a WHERE d.no = a.house_no;
